summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 11, D. T. Denny's Waterfront Addition, being the alley between 2nd Avenue West and 3rd Avenue West from West Harrison Street to West Thomas Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 15807 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
